name: XERONIS RUNNER
description:
Xeronis Runer is a 3D pc game developed in Unity Game Engine. It is a single player racing/running game set in a fantasy and magical land on planet Xeronis. Use rewards and collectibles to upgrade your stats such as stamina and speed. As you race through each track you have to manage your stamina levels as you must avoid cramping your muscles. 

Game is still in development and I expect to be done by May 2023. I am a solo developer and I am here to raise funds to see this game to completion so I appreciate all the support I can get.
